channel.title: Demolitionx [TEAM NEEDED]
channel.description:
I thought I would create a Dev Team topic too therefore I can find one or two helpers. Needed: 1 Client Sided Coder 1 Server Sided Coder 5 Beta Testers
Beta Tester Application Format: [code]Name: Age: Time Zone: Experience: Time Online Daily: [/code]
Server/Client Sided Coder Application Format: [code]Name: Age: Location: Experience: Past Projects: Position Applied For: Time Online Daily: [/code]
[ul][list][u][b]Welcome To Demolitionx Development![/b][/u]
[color=red]The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [b][color=orange]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. [color=green]The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished. [b]Features:[/b] [list] [li]Full Castle Wars[/li] [li]Full Fight Pits[/li] [li]Full Duel Arena[/li] [li]Full Thieving[/li] [li]Fully Working Melee[/li] [li]Fully Working Magic[/li] [li]Fully Working Range[/li] [li]12 Completed Quests[/li] [li]90% Prayer Working[/li] [li]Fully Working Pest Control[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [/list] [b]Latest updates:[/b] [list] [li]::home added[/li] [li]::castlewars added[/li] [li]::fightpits added[/li] [li][/li] [/list]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20060904214339/runescape/images/archive/5/5c/20100607202120!Minigame_icon.png[/img] [b]Minigames[/b]

[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Minigames/Castle_Wars.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]

item.title: Demolitionx [TEAM NEEDED]
item.dc:creator: @aerialprojects aerialprojects
item.description:
@aerialprojects wrote:

Again another fail remake Guys not to offend any of you But if your using Pi as the base then just stop cause every Pi with old school gameframe dosent have lunar. And if u want lunar on it then have fun remaking the rsinterface class and client class ;D

GL with team doh
